column4: "Ndɛ so mo nkɔmbɔdzi yɛ etuatsew: Me nsa yɛ m'apensi do durdur."

column2: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ minyim beebi mbrɛ mubohu no
"Ɔno na nkyɛ mubohue m'asɛm egu n'enyim
column3: Na meebisabisa no nsɛm ara yie."

column2: "Nkyɛ meehu nsɛm a ɔdze bobua me
column3: Na maatse dza ɔbɛka akyerɛ me no ase."

column2: "Ana ɔnye me bɛham wɔ no tum kɛseyɛ no mu? Dabida; mbom ɔbɛyɛ aso ama me."
"Hɔ na tseneneenyi nye no beyi atsɛn; Nna mibefi me tsɛmbuafo nsamu korakora."

column4: na onnyi hɔ; Na ekyir so
na mohwɛ no a ɔnnyɛ: Osuma noho wɔ enyimfa

column2: "Na ɔno onyim kwan a mefa do: Sɛ ɔasɔ me ahwɛ a
column3: nkyɛ mada edzi dɛ sika kɔkɔɔ mapa a wɔdze afa gya mu."

column2: "M'anan etsintsim n'anamɔn mu dzendzenndzen: No kwan na mesie
"Mennsaan ekyir mimmfii n'anomu mbrasɛm ho; Mesie n'anomunsɛm na ɔsom mo bo yie."

column4: na woana na ɔbɛdan no? Na dza ɔpɛ no

column2: "Na ɔno na ɔyɛ dza wɔahyɛ ama no no: Na ndzɛmba a ɔtsetse dɛm pii wɔ ne nkyɛn."
"Dɛm ntsi morofona wɔ n'enyim; Sɛ modwendwen a
"Osiandɛ woenntwa me annkyen wɔ sum no enyim
column3: Nkyii so ɔannkata sum kebii no do wɔ m'enyim."
